name: Chubby Tubbies
description:
Meet the Chubby Tubbies! Join these wacky characters in their ground-digging and water-flowing frenzy in this new exciting match-3 game!

Make lines of matching Tubbies to dig through layers of ground and flow the water! Use the power of the Super Tubbies to create spectaculair chain-reactions.

Will you help the cute Tubbies with your super puzzling skills? Play through tons of fun and challenging levels and become the Chubby King!

Download Chubby Tubbies now!
